items.title: Israel PM 'uncertain' over condition of three Gaza hostages
items.description: Benjamin Netanyahu said he knew "with certainty" that 21 hostages were alive but the status of "three more" were unclear.

items.title: Watch: Moments past conclaves elected new popes
items.description: See the moments previous popes were elected by conclaves past, from 1939 to 2013.

items.title: Dozens of pro-Palestinian protesters arrested at Columbia University
items.description: The university asked for police help after protesters occupied part of the main library on Wednesday.

items.title: US judge blocks plan to deport migrants to Libya
items.description: The order comes after lawyers expressed alarm that the US was planning to deport migrants to the North African country "immediately".

items.title: Smokey Robinson denies sexual assault allegations
items.description: In a statement, the singer's lawyer says the abuse allegations are an attempt to "extract money".
